C D G H I M P R S T V W 

C

client - package client
client package is the part that is responsible for running a command line UI and the player can send its commands and play the game through it.
Client - Class in client.view
This Client class contains the main function for the client side of the program.
Client() - Constructor for class client.view.Client
 
client.controller - package client.controller
controller package
client.net - package client.net
net package
client.view - package client.view
net package
CmdType - Enum in client.controller
All commands that can be types by client
connect(String, int, SafeOutput) - Method in class client.net.ServerConnection
Creates a new class and connects to the server.
Controller - Class in client.controller
The Controller class is responsible for handling input commands passed from client.view.Interpreter.
Controller(SafeOutput) - Constructor for class client.controller.Controller
The constructor saves client.view.SafeOutput reference.

D

disconnect() - Method in class client.net.ServerConnection
It will closes the socket and our state changes to not connected.

G

getConnected() - Method in class client.net.ServerConnection
It is used by other classes to check whether we are connected to server or not.

H

handleCMD(String) - Method in class client.controller.Controller
Splites the input string and compares first part with client.controller.CmdType types.

I

Interpreter - Class in client.view
The interpreter class is responsible for reading client's commands.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class client.view.Client
Prints the welcome message to the client and creates an interpreter class to handle client's commands.

P

print(String) - Method in class client.view.SafeOutput
Prints the output
println(String) - Method in class client.view.SafeOutput
Synchronized method prints the output as a line
printPrompt() - Method in class client.view.SafeOutput
Prints the PROMP char
printResult(String) - Method in class client.view.SafeOutput
Prints the output as a line with PROMP

R

run() - Method in class client.view.Interpreter
Reads console input line and trims it and tell client.controller.Controller to handle it.

S

SafeOutput - Class in client.view
It is a class for writing into console and it is completely threadsafe.
SafeOutput() - Constructor for class client.view.SafeOutput
 
sendMessage(String) - Method in class client.net.ServerConnection
Sends the message to the server.
ServerConnection - Class in client.net
The ServerConnection class is responsible for communicating the server.
ServerConnection() - Constructor for class client.net.ServerConnection
 

T

toString() - Method in enum client.controller.CmdType
 

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum client.controller.CmdType
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
values() - Static method in enum client.controller.CmdType
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

W

WELCOME_MESSAGE - Static variable in class client.view.Client
